experiences.title: Lead Software Engineer
details: Designed and create unique websites. Developed application to help dental marketing.
Create content and assist with maintaince of client website.
Leading role in the development of software infrastructure including building back-end systems to manage accounts and maintain online regular events.
Develop UI and back-end logic to enhance user experience.
Create and maintain website using WordPress and other platforms as needed.
Supported other developer as mentor and subject matter expert in managing escalated issues.
Routinely worked with Tier 3 agents and engineers to troubleshoot and resolve emerging issues.
Perform comparative research to determine the cause of issues and identify areas needing improvement.

Assisted with debugging and website optimization
Assisted in third-party partners as well as internal engineers in developing and customizing software.
